channel.title: Portsmouth F.C. on mattischrome
channel.description: Recent content in Portsmouth F.C. on mattischrome

item.title: Don't Break The Chain
item.description: 2025 might be a tough year, but I am going to try and blog every day. It means that now and then I might be writing a post like this one, where I am writing for the sake of continuing the streak. If I find myself doing that too often then I will take the hint and stop trying!
